scenes.background: You agree to handle the report. [Bob] asks a follow-up question.
scenes.description: [Bob] says, 'Can you also review the financials by the end of the day?'

options.text: I'll try my best, but I can't promise it will be perfect.
options.analysis: You show decent self-regulation and motivation, but your social skill in managing expectations could be improved.

options.text: I can review the financials, but I'll need some help to get it done on time.
options.analysis: You show strong social skills and emotional perception, but may lack empathy by not fully taking on the task independently.

options.text: I think it would be better if someone else handles the financials while I focus on the report.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation and social skills, but your emotional perception is lower as you shift the task priorities.
